Label for search engine buttons. The argument corresponds to the name of the search engine.
For search suggestions prompt. This string should be short so it fits nicely on the prompt row.
Label for search settings button.

Accessibility label for image of default search engine displayed left to the actual search suggestions from the engine. The parameter substituted for \"%@\" is the name of the search engine. E.g.: Search suggestions from Google

trans-unit.target: 検索候補を表示しますか？
trans-unit.note: Prompt shown before enabling provider search queries
For search suggestions prompt. This string should be short so it fits nicely on the prompt row.
Header for the list of devices table
Close button in top navigation bar

On/off toggle to select adding this url to your bookmarks

trans-unit.note: On/off toggle to select adding this url to your reading list
A brief descriptive name for this app on this device, used for Send Tab and Synced Tabs. The first argument is the app name. The second argument is the device name.

trans-unit.target: ブックマークメニュー
trans-unit.note: The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the menu. This should match bookmarks.folder.menu.label on Android.

trans-unit.target: ブックマークツールバー
trans-unit.note: The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the toolbar. This should match bookmarks.folder.toolbar.label on Android.

trans-unit.target: モバイルブックマーク
trans-unit.note: The title of the folder that contains mobile bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.mobile.label on Android.

trans-unit.target: 未整理のブックマーク
trans-unit.note: The name of the folder that contains unsorted desktop bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.unfiled.label on Android.
The default name for bookmark folders without titles. The default name for bookmark nodes without titles.
